Side-A Side-B About

Winona

Wine on paper.

We miss DIY, so we decided to drink and draw a zine about wines. A very productive excuse to go for a drink. Besides tasting incredible wines, we interviewed small Portuguese producers, recommended some of the best taverns and “vinhos da casa” in Lisbon, paired wine with music and even had a launch party.


The first issue was red and all about red wine.

The next issue will be sparkling and it's already in the barrels. Cheers!

Zine, editorial Words & photography: Andreia Luísa, Marta Santos Design: Marta Santos Wine expertise: Patrícia Pombo & Pour Decisions

Noite Oráculo Um Horror de Licor
